response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and value. It is worth $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its high-quality materials, cutting-edge technology, and unique features.

To make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering the product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is available for a limited time only, and it represents a significant savings compared to its market value. We understand the importance of making such a significant investment, and we are confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your success.

Please let us know if you have any questions about the product or need further information to help you make a decision. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
